stimulusHtml: The sculpture depicted in the image best provides evidence of which of the following?

features.html:
© The Trustees of the British Museum

The Sphinx of Taharqo likely depicts a Nubian king of the twenty-fifth dynasty.

choicesHtml: One of the world’s earliest advanced, large-scale societies
The early spread of Bantu linguistic influence in Africa
An undocumented period in African history
Emerging centers of learning in West Africa
